author: Paul Rankin
method: Place the watercress, Stilton, walnuts, olive oil and black pepper into a mini food processor and blend until smooth. Place the baguette slices onto a serving plate. Spread over the walnut and Stilton mixture and serve.
ingredients: 40g/1Â½oz watercress,  30g/1oz Stilton,  2 tbsp shelled walnuts,  2 tbsp olive oil,  freshly ground black pepper,  2 slices baguette, toasted
